body:
Sorry for not being clear. I was talking about the latest legacy version: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/honeybee)



[You can use Honeybee and Ladybug components to update](http://hydrashare.github.io/hydra/viewer?owner=mostaphaRoudsari&fork=hydra_1&id=Update_Ladybug_and_Honeybee&slide=0&scale=1&offset=0,0) but unless you really need to I don't suggest you to do so. Especially now that you're getting started with Honeybee and most of the example files on Hydra are in sync with the latest stable version which you can download from Food4Rhino.



Mostapha
